Html:
Hi,

I am writing an app which uses Modern UI as the interface. I am using some custom controls, though, and I'd like them to be the same color as Modern UI. Specifically, I'm using Modern UI (Metro) Charts.

Is there a way I can find the default color of the background (Dark Theme)? Or is there a way I can apply it directly to a control? Is there a Style?

Thanks in advance! This is an excellent project!

Check out the Theme resource reference

The brushes for the light and dark themes are defined in ModernUI.Light.xaml and ModernUI.Dark.xaml.
